additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: externalId (值: None) - If the event originates from a record in a 3rd party system, use this parameter to pass the unique ID of that record. That ID will be communicated in outbound webhook notifications from SIGNL4, which is great for correlation/synchronization of that record with the alert. If you resolve / close an alert you must use the same External ID as in the original alert.

filtering (值: None) - Whether to apply event filtering for this event, or not. If set to true, the event will only trigger a notification to the team, if it contains at least one keyword from one of your services and system categories (i.e. it is whitelisted)
locationFieldsUi (值: None) - Transmit location information ('latitude, longitude') with your event and display a map in the mobile app
service (值: None) - Assigns the alert to the service/system category with the specified name
title (值: None) - The title or subject of this alert
